name: aspnetcore-metered-memory-cache-k6-tests
description: k6 performance tests for ASP.NET Core MeteredMemoryCache example

scripts.test:all: npm run test:smoke && npm run test:load && npm run test:stress && npm run test:spike && npm run test:breakpoint
scripts.test:quick: npm run test:smoke && npm run test:load
scripts.test:performance: npm run test:stress && npm run test:spike && npm run test:breakpoint
scripts.install:k6: echo 'Please install k6 manually. See README-k6-Tests.md for instructions.'
scripts.check:app: pwsh -Command "try { Invoke-WebRequest -Uri '$BASE_URL/health' -UseBasicParsing | Out-Null; Write-Host 'Application is running' } catch { Write-Host 'Application not running. Start with: cd ../src && dotnet run' }"
scripts.check:all: npm run check:k6 && npm run check:app
scripts.run:all: npm run run:pwsh || npm run run:bash || npm run run:windows

author: Richard Murillo
